content.rendered: Blunck Law, LLC is a mediation and civil litigation practice in West Linn, Oregon, just south of Portland.  Lawrence P. Blunck is a mediator, arbitrator and trial lawyer with significant experience across a wide range of practice areas including complex personal injury and auto accidents, construction defect cases, property disputes and premises liability matters, construction site injuries, fire loss and landslides, product liability, and more.
